page.title: 12LOCAL NEWS - SCHOOLS
page.content: Askam's Under 5's (1985) This particular group held an exhibition and social evening on 20th May in the Local Community Centre. There were a number of attractions including such things as cake, craft and toy stalls, a very fine bookstall, a raffle and all the usual items. There was also an exhibition of the work done by the children of various playgroups which was open from 6 pm to 8 pm. ***** St. Peter's School (1985) At St. Peter's School there was an official opening of the Adventure Playground by A.E.Fisher and the Rev. D.Sanderson who are joint chairman of the Action Committee to "Save Ireleth School". This venture, financed by the 200 Club, took place on 2nd May.
